author: pderop
msg: FELIX-4869: Fixed a bug where optional dependency callbacks are not invoked if the optional dependency
is added while the component is fully started (TRACKING_OPTIONAL), and while dependency is already available.

author: rgodfrey
msg: QPID-6514 : Implement plugin that warns and/or disconnects a client if the Qpid Client is too old (applied patch from Lorenz Quack)

author: stsp
msg: On the 1.9.x branch, merge r1663530 from trunk.
Use APR threadkey API instead of thread-local storage in C tests.
Fixes random C test crashes on OpenBSD and possibly other systems.

author: stsp
msg: * STATUS: Move r1663530 to approved section (test-only change, 2 votes suffice).
